topics.body:
So I'm so happy, I finally drew a pair of breasts exactly the way I wanted them to look on the Body sketch.

Fucking finally! Why are boobs so hard to draw. I can never get them in the right spot, One's sometimes always bigger then the other, they might be too round shaped, or they might be to flat or big or pointy looking! UUUUHHHHH!!!

Since I got them the way I want I can go back and reference them, Now if only If I could just get the physics down packed I'll be set. 

And yes, I am casually talking about how to draw boobs, what of it. Their really hard to draw man! D:
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5
